name: InstalliOSProvisioningProfile
description: Install an iOS provisioning profile required to build an iOS app on a Mac build server
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: provProfileSource
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile Source Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provisioning profile can be installed from `Secure File` uploaded to the server or a file in the source repository or a file on the build server.

inputs.name: provProfileSecureFile
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provisioning Profile uploaded to `Secure Files` on Visual Studio Team Services that should be installed on the Mac build agent.

inputs.name: provProfileFilePath
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of Provisioning Profile that should be installed on the Mac build agent.

inputs.name: removeProfile
inputs.label: Remove Profile After Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to specify that the Provisioning Profile should be removed from the build agent after the build is complete.
